Make a SignPost and return priority for it.

Parameters:
sign Data is set in this.
inData The sign to make SignPost for.
map The GenericMap to have the resulting string in.
newSigns Whether or not it should use the new sign table.
Returns:
The prio for the sign, MAX_UINT32 if sign shouldn't be used.
